TestCase.name: testGroupAggregate
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[TMP_0]) StreamExecGlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS TMP_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, Partial_COUNT(a) AS count$0]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithAverage
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, Final_AVG(sum$0, count$1) AS TMP_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, Partial_AVG(a0) AS (sum$0, count$1)]) StreamExecCalc(select=[b, a, CAST(a) AS a0]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithExpressionInSelect
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[TMP_0, TMP_1]) StreamExecGlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[d], select=[d, Final_MIN(min$0) AS TMP_0, Final_AVG(sum$1, count$2) AS TMP_1]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[d], select=[d, Partial_MIN(c) AS min$0, Partial_AVG(a) AS (sum$1, count$2)]) StreamExecCalc(select=[c, a, MOD(b, 3) AS d]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithConstant1
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[4 AS four, TMP_0]) StreamExecGlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS TMP_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_SUM(b) AS sum$0]) StreamExecCalc(select=[4 AS four, b, a]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithConstant2
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[4 AS four, TMP_0]) StreamExecGlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS TMP_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) StreamExecCalc(select=[4 AS four, a, b]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS TMP_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) StreamExecCalc(select=[CAST(2) AS b, a], where=[=(b, 2)]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
